net.co.java.packets

Class InteractPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.packets.InteractPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketHandler, PacketWrapper

    public class InteractPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketHandler
    The Interact packet is most commonly used for direct melee/archer attacks, but also used for certain player to player actions, such as marriage.
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling
